turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order coffee drink, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just simple. And make it a tall please, tall cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, which store would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, let me see.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: from 4th Street in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say 4th street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me send your order there, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a tall cappuccino to be picked up at the starbucks on 4th street in colorado springs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe I can get something from the bakery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a chocolate chip cookie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i'll add that to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
